thread.title: Pack up! Shraddha Kapoor, 'Baaghi' team scream and celebrate
thread.title_full: Pack up! Shraddha Kapoor, 'Baaghi' team scream and celebrate - Entertainment

author: PTI
title: Pack up! Shraddha Kapoor, 'Baaghi' team scream and celebrate
text:
Actress Shraddha Kapoor has completed the shooting of director Sabbir Khan's "Baaghi".
The 26-year-old actress, who will be seen romancing "Heropanti" actor Tiger Shroff for the first time, took Twitter to share the Kerala shoot details. "PACK UP! #LastDay #Kerala #BAAGHI," she tweeted.
  A video posted by Shraddha Kapoor (@shraddhakapoor) onOct 1, 2015 at 6:57am PDT
 
The "ABCD2" star also posted a video, featuring her and her team shouting "pack up!" Shraddha shared a series of on-set pictures including one of ace cinematographer Binod Pradhan.
"So honoured to be shooting with a legend!! #BinodPradhan #DOP #BAAGHI," she captioned it.
  A photo posted by Shraddha Kapoor (@shraddhakapoor) onOct 1, 2015 at 5:23am PDT
 
"Baaghi", a romantic-action film produced by Sajid Nadiadwala and UTV Motion Pictures, is slated for a 2016 release.
Apart from this, Shraddha is also working on "Rock On 2". She is the newest addition to the film that has Farhan Akhtar, Arjun Rampal, and Prachi Desai reprising their roles.
